description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=2/3. You wake up one day to hear a stranger laughing at you, claiming that his reactor tank is bigger than yours. This cannot be happening! Choose your gladiator and prove your superiority in this hardcore, nonstop straight-in-your-face fast-paced 3D multiplayer action trip! Hard2Morrow comes with never-seen-on-indie cutting-edge graphics and an awesome metal driven soundtrack.
